name: Wizards (itch)
description:
This is a multiplayer only game - You will need another person to play it.

Duck and jump around your opponent's spells and cast some of your own at them!

-------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press ESC to set up the controls.

CONTROLS:
* LEFT and RIGHT to move
* A to jump
* DOWN to duck
* DOWN in air to land faster
* B to attack
* B + UP to high attack
* Q to reset

Press A and S and Up to enter debug mode
